author: sky.cactus
content: I think it is under appreciated how many users are waiting for L2s that are actually censorship resistant and have security features on-par with L1.

author: sky.cactus
content: Optimistic rollups have the problem of needing to run a verifier, or trust that someone else is (and for all we know no one is).  All L2s currently deployed (except Fuel) also have admin backdoors/upgradability as well.

author: sky.cactus
content: zkRollups would be ideal, but they are hard to build and StarkWare (the people who seem to be furthest along) are being weird about their open sourcing strategy and are still running a permissioned prover last I checked.

author: sky.cactus
content: Basically we want a row on this table that is white all the way across, and ideally has ZK proofs in the left most column: <https://l2beat.com/?view=risk>
